1.text: My son looks forward to his French classes every week. The teaching staff is very kind and attentive. He's made tremendous progress, and I love seeing how much joy he takes in learning.
1.author: — Marc, father of Julien

2.text: We enrolled our daughter in Saturday classes, and she loves it! In addition to making progress in French, she's met other French-speaking children. It's a great initiative to maintain the French language and culture even while living outside France.
2.author: — Sophie, mother of Léa

3.text: We were worried that our children would lose their French as expatriates, but thanks to this association, not only have they maintained the language, but they've developed a true attachment to French culture. The teachers are amazing!
3.author: — Claire and Thomas, parents of Camille and Lucas

join.title: Ready to join the adventure?
join.subtitle: Sign your child up today to help them discover French in a fun and nurturing environment!
